title: Lucky Charms
description: Poems like…“Sidepiece”… ladies have you ever been a man’s sidepiece?“Dear Devil”… remembering what it was like when youwere in the world.“Gang Life”… when that’s the only family you know.“A Risk”…when that one moment of pleasure could be the ultimate end.“Keeping Secrets”…we all have our skeletons.“Who am I?”… when you are licensed to be you.
author: Tiffany Tolbert
